alert.note: Alert for Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:43AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Possible This Morning... Patchy fog has developed across far southern Monterery County this morning. Visibility reductions to around 1/2 mile have been observed, with reductions to around 1/4 mile possible in spots. This fog should persist through the morning hours before dissipating Motorists are advised to drive with caution as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Slick and slippery road conditions may also exist due to temperatures at or below freezing. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
